definition: to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
5th earthly branch: 7-9 a.m., 3rd solar month (5th April-4th May), year of the Dragon/ancient Chinese compass point: 120°
to shake up/to jolt/to vibrate/to oscillate/to fluctuate

sentences.english: Compounding the problems of the quake aftermath will likely be the numerous aftershocks that accompany any major earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 震後的問題中可能還有伴隨大震而來的無數餘震。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the relation between the internal structure of the Moon and the radial distribution of the focuses of moonquakes.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論月球的內部構造與月震震源徑向分佈的關係。

sentences.english: An electronic receiver designed to pick up seismic vibrations.
sentences.chinese: 因地震的震動力而搖動。

sentences.english: The sky had a yellow cast the kind of light sometimes called "earthquake weather."
sentences.chinese: 天空泛着一層黃光，這種光有時叫做△鮐震天氣”。

sentences.english: How does the lunar regolith affect transmission of seismic energy?
sentences.chinese: 月球表面的月塵怎樣影響到月震能量的傳播？

sentences.english: In practically no time King had established a reputation for an uncanny nose.
sentences.chinese: 金因其非同尋常的鼻子一下子名聲大震。

sentences.english: Social public security is one of the main functions of government departments in response to large earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 社會治安是政府部門大震反應中的主要職能之一。

sentences.english: There were reports of many deaths in the Indonesian island of Nias, south of the earthquake's epicentre .
sentences.chinese: 位於震中南部的印尼尼亞斯島報告有大量人員死亡。

sentences.english: The island was convulsed by an earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 因地震的震動力而搖動。

sentences.english: A surface at which seismic wave velocities change.
sentences.chinese: 因地震的震動力而搖動。

sentences.english: The mechanical process of compressivestrain-tensional strain-earthquake is dynamic characteristic of strain anomaly.
sentences.chinese: 壓一張一發震的力學過程是應變異常的動態特點。

sentences.english: You also have amount of rumbles you can use to shake new jewels to the screen.
sentences.chinese: 同時你還有大量的機會用震雷將寶石震落到屏幕裏。

sentences.english: Intensity measures the strength of shaking produced by the earthquake at a certain location.
sentences.chinese: 烈度測量的是在特定地點地震所產生的震動力。

definition: to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself
to rupture/to burst open/to break up
loud sound, such as that of thunder or a bomb/to rumble/to roar
sudden clap of thunder/fig. surprising turn of events
to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
the earth quaked, the mountains shook (idiom); a tremendous battle
variant of 燙|烫[tang4]/variant of 趟[tang4]
